Yandex Disk.name: P01a.01
Yandex Disk.description: Are the company’s privacy policies easy to find?

Yandex Disk.name: P01a.02
Yandex Disk.description: Are the privacy policies available in the primary language(s) spoken by users in the company’s home jurisdiction?

Yandex Disk.name: P01a.03
Yandex Disk.description: Are the policies presented in an understandable manner?

Yandex Disk.name: P01a.04
Yandex Disk.description: (For mobile ecosystems): Does the company disclose that it requires apps made available through its app store to provide users with a privacy policy?

Yandex Disk.name: P01a.05
Yandex Disk.description: (For personal digital assistant ecosystems): Does the company disclose that it requires skills made available through its skill store to provide users with a privacy policy?
